entry.title: HTML代码使用片
entry.content: 水平居中 父元素和子元素宽度未知 inline-block + text-align: center123456.parent { text-align: center;}.child { display: inline-block;} 优点：兼容性好缺点：子元素继承了父元素的text-align属性，子元素需设text-align:left table + margin1234.child { display: table; margin : 0 auto;} 优点：只设置子元素的样式 absolute + transfrom12345678.parent { position: relative;}.child{ position: absolute; left:50%; transform: translateX(-50%);} 优点：居中元素不会对其他元素产生影响缺点：transform 属性是css3属性，有兼容性问题 flex + justify-content1234.parent { display:flex; justify-content: center;} 优点：只需要设置父元素的样式缺点：兼容性问题 flex + margin1234.parent { display: flex; margin: 0 auto} 垂直居中 父元素和子元素的高度都未知 table-cell + vertical-align1234.parent { display: table-cell; vertical-align: middle;} 优点：兼容性好 absolute + transform12345678.parent { position: relative;}.child { position: absolute; top: 50%; transform: translateY(-50%);} 优点：居中元素不会影响其他元素缺点：存在兼容性问题 flex + align-item1234.parent { display: flex; align-item: center;} 优点：只需设置父元素的样式缺点：兼容性问题 水平垂直居中 父元素和子元素的宽高都未知 inline-block + text-align + table-cell + vertical-align12345678.parent { text-align: center; display: table-cell; vertical-align: middle}.child { display: inline-block} absolute + transform123456789.parent { position: relative}.child { position: absolute; top:50%; left:50%; transform: translate(-50%)} flex + justify-content + align-items12345.parent { display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center} 多列布局 定宽-自适应float + margin1234567.left { float: left; width: 100px}.right { margin-left: 120px} float + overflow12345678.left { float: left; width: 100px; margin-right: 20px}.right { overflow: hidden} table123456789101112.parent { display: table width: 100%}.left { display:table-cell width:100px; padding-right:20px}.right { display: table-cell;} flex12345678910.parent { display: flex;}.left { width:100px margin-right:20px}.right { flex:1} 不定宽-自适应float + overflow1234567.left { float:left; margin-right: 20px}.right{ overflow:hidden} table12345678910.parent { display: table;}.left,.right { display: table-cell}.left{ width: 0.1% padding-right: 20px} flex123456789.parent { display: flex;}.left { margin-right: 20px}.right { flex: 1}
